Room.Name: Sky Over Vallenda Pass
Room.ShortDescription: The pass makes a slight turn below you. 70.n1.e0.s0.w24 The pass was created eons ago by a stream that cut its way between two
Room.LongDescription: great mountains. To the south is the Nartiz, while to the north you can see the Aphinix. Farther west is the Vallenda Plains, and a badlands. The village of Brownhaven lies to the east.
